title: Pool Party Caitlyn sure is Something

> 
> "something something good cop something something bad cop something something all wet"

The joke: "good cop, bad cop, all wet"
She needs a VU with new VO
She’s part of Piltover’s finest for more than one reason :3

She definitely is! she is so good looking as well as sophisticated and strong willed! you don't get to be Piltover's sheriff for no reason! it takes the right kind of person to be able to handle it because of how Piltover and its people are.

I love how classy she looks and its not just a bikini skin! well it is but she got style! and that white shirt and thigh strap is a nice touch! she is Piltover's finest for a reason!

For some reason i noticed Caitlyn's name doesn't come up often when people are talking about their favorite champions but i think she is adorable! she is among my top 3 champions. <3

This skin is definitely a buy for me! first skin i'm willing to get since SG Soraka!

Legs!

{{sticker:sg-lux}}

My faith in Riot has been slightly restored. I'm really surprised they went with a full on bikini but I'm not complaining :D This gives me hope for the future Pool Party Ahri that will inevitably come and eat my money.

Poor crab, he did nothing wrong to deserve that kind of treatment  
Cait stole his chaise lounge, had him waving a giant leaf for her refreshment, and then at the end of the recall kicked him for no reason rather than thank him

# #savecrab
Are we going to ignore how handsomely awesome GP looks?
He reminds me of a BBQ uncle, you know, the cool one.

Looking like a snack

{{sticker:sg-lux}}

>Looking like a snack

>{{sticker:sg-lux}} 

https://ci.memecdn.com/10784502.gif

FTFY

I am genuinely surprised she got this skin.  I genuinely expected Ahri, and I honestly wouldn't have minded because
1. It's been nearly a year since her last skin, and
2. Being sexy is already large part of her theme

Not that I mind, since I love Caitlyn and the swimsuit looks awesome.  Although I think it's kind of strange we got this while it's been acknowledged that Caitlyn's dress is too sexy for her theme, normally.

TBF, Ahri's model needs a huge touch up if she ever got a Pool Party skin. The tails are the biggest issues since they're not all coming out from the same point - I think one is coming out of her leg?

It'd be cool if they just used the Star Guardian base for all of Ahri's animations but I guess Riot wants to wait until they give her a complete Visual update? Who knows?

The first bikini pool party skin and it's... Caitlyn... pretty sure nobody was asking for Cait to be the first bikini PP skin.. what about Ahri? Nidalee? MF? Sona? Kat?

Why'd they have to give it to the most annoying champion in the game? I'm gonna have to lane against nothing but Caits... 

######For the record, she's tied with a couple other champs for the title of "most annoying" .. Ahri, Lux, and Soraka all take that spot too

>The first bikini pool party skin and it's... Caitlyn

All we know is that it couldn't be Jinx.

https://pre00.deviantart.net/166e/th/pre/i/2015/197/2/b/league_of_legends_vi_gank_by_sorelag-d8opq4z.jpg
